title: Blue Benjamin
lyrics:
Ey, bout to flood the whole summer yeah
Brand new Balenciaga's these is runners yeah
AP yes that bitch be flooded man
These AK47's hold a hundred man
House so God damn big it's like a castle man
These niggas telling lies they ain't a hundred man

That pack you smoking on that shit be fufu man

Blue benjamins that nigga is my best friend



Skrrt skrrt

Two hundred on the dash

12 on me I had to get away from they're ass

Stashed the pole in the motherfucking dash

You know, you know, you know

I'm bout my money nigga you already know

Security pat me down at the door

Keep that pole everywhere that I go

I flooded my watch, a Patek

Giving these niggas static

You a fuck a boy you won't get it

Send me shots [?]

Why you tweaking tweaky

This nigga tweaking tweaking

Real savage nigga I grew up around some demons



Ey, bout to flood the whole summer yeah

Brand new Balenciaga's these is runners yeah

AP yes that bitch be flooded man

These AK47's hold a hundred man

House so God damn big it's like a castle man

These niggas telling lies they ain't a hundred man

That pack you smoking on that shit be fufu man

Blue benjamins that nigga is my best friend



Nigga holding on the work we gon take him down

He flexing like he got but he got a pound

[?] hanging like they street but they [?]

Shoot a nigga in his head watch his body fall

We ain't going out like that, this choppa got my back

These niggas be doing [?] we ain't got time for that

This is for the real ones, the real ones, real ones

Only for the real ones, the real ones, real ones

He can't relate

All my street niggas can relate

All my street niggas can relate

Put a pussy nigga in his place

Put a fuck boy right up in his place



Ey, bout to flood the whole summer yeah

Brand new Balenciaga's these is runners yeah

AP yes that bitch be flooded man

These AK47's hold a hundred man

House so God damn big it's like a castle man

These niggas telling lies they ain't a hundred man

That pack you smoking on that shit be fufu man

Blue benjamins that nigga is my best friend
